ComicInfo.Title: Last Call
ComicInfo.Summary: October, 1944. Nazi fortunes appear bleaker by the day as the Allied noose around Germany tightens during the waning days of World War II. But in the bowels of the Wenceslas Mines, a terrible threat has emerged... The Nazis have discovered the ability to conquer time itself with the help of a new ominous device! Now a rag tag group of American GIs must stop this threat to the past, present, and future... While dealing with their past, prejudices, and fears in the process. THIS ISSUE: With a ghastly discovery fresh in their minds, our band of American GI heroes must stop a Nazi train bound for Berlin... While saving a mysterious young girl, hell-bent on revenge! Meanwhile, General Kammler is alerted to the presence of our fearless GIs, and activates a gruesome welcoming party!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-27 18:00:59. [CVDB669967]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Alex Sanchez, Patrick Thomas Parnell, Alex Sanchez, Patrick Thomas Parnell
ComicInfo.Inker: Alex Sanchez, Patrick Thomas Parnell, Alex Sanchez, Patrick Thomas Parnell
